required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Analysis of the Posterior Wall Fracture of the Acetabulum
clinical_study.official_title: Analysis of the Posterior Wall Fracture of the Acetabulum

brief_summary.textblock: Assessement,evaluation of postoperativ reduction of posterior wall acetabular fractures in Assiut University Hospital

detailed_description.textblock: Posterior wall fracture of the acetabulum resemble 30% of acetabular fracture,surgical treatement is the 1st choice now for most of these fractures as it aimes to restore joint conjuroity and decreases the possibelities of osteoarthrities of the hip joint,in this study investigators will make analysis and assessement of the quality of postoperative reduction which is the main indicator of outcome of acetabular fractures in adult patients in Assiut University Hospitsls

primary_outcome.measure: Analysis of the posterior wall fractures of the acetabulum
primary_outcome.description: Analysis and assessement of the quality of postoperative reduction of posterior wall fractures of the acetabulum using postoperative x.ray by MATTA Score

intervention.description: Surgical treatement of posterior acetabular wall fractures

study_pop.textblock: Adult patients of both sexes with posteriir acetabular wall fractures

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- adult patients of both sexes with posterior acetabular wall fracture either isolated or associated with other fractures
Exclusion Criteria:
- other types of acetabular fractures not associated with posterior wall fracture
